mods.abstract: Street scene and mosque of Kait Bey at Cairo. An Egyptian man poses with a donkey in the center of a street lined with small shops and people (left fore-middle ground); funerary mosque complex of Sultan Kait-Bey, built ca. 1472-1474 C.E. (background); "Caire. Mosquée Kait-Bey." in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
